definition: Jingyuan county in Baiyin 白銀|白银[Bai2 yin2], Gansu
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: Li and his family live in Jingyuan, in the centre of Gansu.
sentences.chinese: 李壯和妻兒一家四口住在甘肅省中部的靖遠縣。

sentences.english: Junji the first year of the Qing Dynasty changed its name Wei Jingyuan, Yongzheng was renamed eight years Jingyuan County.
sentences.chinese: 清代順治元年更名靖遠衛，雍正八年改稱靖遠縣。
